library.function:
ClearScreen()
ShowMenu ("Choose your race.", game.races, false) { race = GetObject(result)
do(player, "add_creature_type", QuickParams("creature_type", race)) do(player, "add_bps")
Choose_Handedness() }

ClearScreen()
ShowMenu ("Choose your handedness.", game.hand_traits, false) { trait = GetObject(result)
player.hand_trait = trait
do(trait, "set_hand_stats", QuickParams("entity", player))
Choose_Role() }

ClearScreen()
ShowMenu ("Choose your role. (Only affects starting items!)", game.roles, false) { role = GetObject(result)
do(role, "add_items", QuickParams("entity", player))
EnableTurnScript(TakeTurn_TS) Random_Region_Parent(player) }

status = NewStringDictionary()
DictionaryAdd(status, "time", "Time: " + Get_Time()) DictionaryAdd(status, "date", "Date: " + Get_Date())
DictionaryAdd(status, "gold", "Gold: " + ToString(player.gold))
player.statusattributes = status
